recipe.title: Garlic and Olive Oil Smashed Yukon Gold Potatoes
ingredients: 2 pounds medium-size unpeeled Yukon Gold potatoes, each cut into wedges
instructions: Steam potato wedges until very tender, about 15 minutes. Meanwhile, heat 5 tablespoons oil in large skillet over low heat. Add garlic; sauté until golden, about 6 minutes. Add potatoes and thyme to skillet. Mash coarsely. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to bowl, drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon oil, and serve.
